description:
A 5 minute approach, 30 minute exit almost all on a flat dirt road, and a 1-2 hour canyon with stunning scenery and a big, dark cavern. This is a standout amongst the 7 canyons in the High Spur area.

Nice easy DC

R1 60' tiny arch and tree to pothole (or stem over on rappel, assist out if go in)

12' tricky DC and slide OR meat anchor and partner assist

R2 Deadman/sandtrap 50' 2 stage OR tricky DC on knob and assist Squeezing R3 70' 2 stage Nice light spot and subway feature Opens, DC, unavoidable pool Exit up L

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
